tests.title: Mini Test 01: Dativ Focus
tests.description: Practice Dativ articles, pronouns, and prepositions

tests.title: Mini Test 02: Adjective Endings
tests.description: Practice adjective endings in Nominativ, Akkusativ, and Dativ

tests.title: Mini Test 03: Fill in the blank
tests.description: Practice Dativ and grammar with short fill-in answers

tests.title: Mini Test 04: Akkusativ
tests.description: Practice Akkusativ articles, pronouns, and prepositions

tests.title: Mini Test 05: Präpositionen
tests.description: Practice prepositions with Akkusativ and Dativ (Wechselpräpositionen and fixed)

tests.title: Mock Exam 01: Reading
tests.description: Reading comprehension with blog, email, and job ad

tests.title: Mock Exam 02: Reading
tests.description: Reading comprehension with article, email, and notice

tests.title: Mock Exam 03: Reading
tests.description: Reading comprehension with email invitation

tests.title: Mini Test 06: Perfekt
tests.description: Practice Perfekt (past tense) with haben and sein

tests.title: Mini Test 07: Präteritum
tests.description: Practice Präteritum (simple past) with sein, haben, werden, and modal verbs

tests.title: Mini Test 08: Modal Verbs
tests.description: Practice modal verbs (können, müssen, wollen, dürfen, sollen, mögen)

tests.title: Mini Test 09: Separable Verbs
tests.description: Practice separable verbs (prefix position in different tenses)

tests.title: Mini Test 10: Verb Forms Mixed
tests.description: Practice mixed tenses (Present, Perfekt, Präteritum) and irregular verbs

tests.title: Mini Test 11: Verbs Quick Practice
tests.description: Quick review of all verb topics (tenses, modal verbs, separable verbs)

tests.title: Mini Test 12: weil & dass
tests.description: Practice subordinating conjunctions weil (because) and dass (that)

tests.title: Mini Test 13: wenn & als
tests.description: Practice temporal conjunctions wenn (when/if, repeated/future) and als (when, one-time past)

tests.title: Mini Test 14: obwohl, trotzdem, deshalb
tests.description: Practice conjunctions for contrast (obwohl, trotzdem) and consequence (deshalb)

tests.title: Mini Test 15: Conjunctions Mixed
tests.description: Comprehensive review of all conjunction types (weil, dass, wenn, als, obwohl, trotzdem, deshalb)

tests.title: Mini Test 16: Reflexive Verbs
tests.description: Practice reflexive verbs and pronouns (sich waschen, sich freuen, sich erinnern)

tests.title: Mini Test 17: Relative Pronouns
tests.description: Practice relative pronouns (der, die, das) and relative clauses

tests.title: Mini Test 18: Pronouns Mixed
tests.description: Comprehensive review of all pronoun types (personal, possessive, reflexive, relative)

tests.title: Mini Test 19: Comparatives
tests.description: Practice comparative forms (größer, schneller, besser) with als and wie

tests.title: Mini Test 20: Superlatives
tests.description: Practice superlative forms (am größten, der beste) - attributive and predicate

tests.title: Mini Test 21: Passive Voice
tests.description: Practice passive voice (werden + past participle) in present and past

tests.title: Mini Test 22: Passive with Modal Verbs
tests.description: Practice passive voice with modal verbs (muss/kann/soll + past participle + werden)

tests.title: Mini Test 23: Konjunktiv II - würde
tests.description: Practice Konjunktiv II with würde + infinitive (polite requests, hypothetical situations)

tests.title: Mini Test 24: Konjunktiv II - hätte, wäre, könnte
tests.description: Practice irregular Konjunktiv II forms (hätte, wäre, könnte, müsste, sollte)

tests.title: Mock Exam 04: Email - Job Application
tests.description: Reading comprehension with formal job application response email

tests.title: Mock Exam 05: Email - Apartment
tests.description: Reading comprehension with apartment inquiry email

tests.title: Mock Exam 06: Article - Learning German
tests.description: Reading comprehension with article about German learning tips

tests.title: Mock Exam 07: Article - Healthy Lifestyle
tests.description: Reading comprehension with article about healthy living

tests.title: Mock Exam 08: Notice - Library
tests.description: Reading comprehension with public notice about library closure

tests.title: Mock Exam 09: Advertisement - Language Course
tests.description: Reading comprehension with language school advertisement

tests.title: Mock Exam 10: Article - Recycling
tests.description: Reading comprehension with article about waste separation and recycling

tests.title: Mock Exam 11: Email - Course Feedback
tests.description: Reading comprehension with email asking for course feedback

tests.title: Quick Test 01: Dativ vs Akkusativ
tests.description: Quick practice for distinguishing Dativ and Akkusativ cases

tests.title: Quick Test 02: Adjective Endings
tests.description: Quick practice for adjective declension (der/ein/no article)

tests.title: Quick Test 03: Word Order
tests.description: Quick practice for German word order (main clauses, questions, subordinate clauses)

tests.title: Quick Test 04: Prepositions (Location)
tests.description: Quick practice for two-way prepositions (Wechselpräpositionen) with location vs. motion

tests.title: Quick Test 05: Common Mistakes
tests.description: Quick practice for common German learner mistakes (false friends, confusing words)

tests.title: Writing Practice 01
tests.description: Short B1-style writing prompts with model answers

tests.title: Listening Test 01: Daily Situations
tests.description: Listening comprehension with weather, announcements, and messages

tests.description: Practice Genitiv articles and prepositions (während, wegen, trotz)

tests.description: Practice Futur I (werden + infinitive) for predictions and intentions

tests.description: Practice zu + infinitive (um...zu, ohne...zu, verbs with zu)

tests.description: Practice entweder...oder, weder...noch, sowohl...als auch, nicht nur...sondern auch

tests.description: Practice dieser, jener, welcher, solcher in all cases

tests.description: Practice meiner, deiner, seiner (independent) in all cases

tests.description: Practice am, um, im, von...bis and time adverbs
